item.description:
If you like 80's music then the Pheonix Landing will be the place to be this Saturday Night! Come out and experience why we are one of the best meetup groups in Boston! All members are welcome!

**If the RSVP is full, please sign up on the wait list. RSVPs are not final until the day of the event, and I will be opening up more spots as the event date approaches**

We will be hitting up the Pheonix Ladning in Cambridge and this will be a great opportunity to meet new people and get your groove on! I expect a big turnout, so RSVPs will fill up quickly - don't miss it!

PLEASE NOTE: I recommend getting there by 10pm. Going early avoids the line drama, and you have more time to talk with nightlife members.

DETAILS: We will meet at 9:00 PM at Pheonix Landing, which is located at 512 Massachusetts Ave in Central Square. I encourage everyone to arrive early to have time to meet people, as the venue will get louder and more crowded as the night progresses. Please look for me to find the group. Cover: $5 after 10pm, I believe.

If traveling by T, Central Square the closest T stop on the red line.

FIND THE ORGANIZER: Click on the link on the left-hand side for Andrew to find my picture. For help/questions, my cell: 617-459-5145.

Hope to see you there! Andrew

*The Organizer reserves the right to adjust RSVPs in order to balance out group turnout.*

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Saturday Night at the Pheonix Landing!
